sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData" />
</template>

<script>
import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "BarChart",
  components: { Bar },
  data() {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: [
          "January",
          "February",
          "March",
          "April",
          "May",
          "June",
          "July",
        ],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Dataset 1",
            data: [10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16],
            backgroundColor: "#FFEAD2",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 2",
            data: [15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21],
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 3",
            data: [20, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26],
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 4",
            data: [25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31],
            backgroundColor: "#8294C4",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 5",
            data: [30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36],
            backgroundColor: "#FFEAD2",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 6",
            data: [35, 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41],
            backgroundColor: "#DBDFEA",
          },
          {
            label: "Dataset 7",
            data: [40, 41, 42, 43, 44, 45, 46],
            backgroundColor: "#ACB1D6",
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true,
        type: "barStacked",
        stacked: true,
        grouped: false,
        scales: {
          x: {
            //position: "top",
          },
        },
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
